DOC.detailed_description: The aim study assess effect functional electrical stimulation ( FES ) associate inspiratory muscle training ( IMT ) functional capacity quality life patient heart failure ( HF ) . A randomized clinical trial 60 HF patient ( functional class II-IV ) randomly assign FES , IMT , IMT associate FES control group . FES apply 15 Hz , 0.4 m pulse width , 10-s contraction time , 50-s resting time maximum tolerable intensity , 3 session per week , 12 week . The IMT also perform 12 week , 5 session per week , intensity 30 % maximal inspiratory pressure . Acute chronic effect intervention functional capacity , quality life , peripheral muscle strength , pulmonary function , respiratory muscle strength endurance , endothelial function , autonomic control oxidative stress analyze patient .
